channel.title: Order on Docs

item.title: Cixi warned the Eight Allied Forces: I don't care if I occupy the land, I can't see the killings, but I won't do it!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Directed by. I once read an interesting article about what would happen if Empress Lu, Wu Zetian, and Cixi fought each other in court. The general opinion is that Empress Lu = Wu Zetian > Ci Xi, these three people are not in a dynasty can not be compared, but from these three people’s diplomacy and internal affairs, let alone Lu and Wu Zetian’s fighting power that is stronger, just put Ci Xi in the end, I believe there will not be many people will raise objections.
